text: My CES special on the PicoBrew ends in a few days.

attachments.text: Buy the world's first automatic all-grain homebrewing appliance.
attachments.fallback: Buy the world's first automatic all-grain homebrewing appliance.

text: that thing is pretty cool but for the money I would rather have one of these, <http://www.mainbrew.com/THE-GRAIN-FATHER-ALL-GRAIN-BREWING-SYSTEM-120V-Prodview.html> It is a nearly automated system that does the full 5 gallon batch size, and you are not locked into their grain bag system. But I do think that is a cool system.

attachments.text: THE GRAIN FATHER - ALL GRAIN BREWING SYSTEM (120V)
attachments.fallback: THE GRAIN FATHER - ALL GRAIN BREWING SYSTEM (120V)

text: Been seeing a number of these automated brewing systems come out recent. Pretty interesting stuff. Was thinking of building one.

attachments.text: Brew-Boss is the most automated electric homebrewing system available. One stop shop for everything you need to homebrew. Electric homebrewing in a Brew-In-A-Bag or BIAB or EBIAB type offering. We also offer homebrew supplies and ingredients.
attachments.fallback: Brew-Boss is the most automated electric homebrewing system available. One stop shop for everything you need to homebrew. Electric homebrewing in a Brew-In-A-Bag or BIAB or EBIAB type offering. We also offer homebrew supplies and ingredients.
